books.author: by Elton John
books.description: The multi-award-winning solo artist's first autobiography chronicles his career, relationships and private struggles.
books.name: ME

books.author: by Ronan Farrow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter details some surveillance and intimidation tactics used to pressure journalists and elude consequences by certain wealthy and connected men.
books.name: CATCH AND KILL

books.author: by Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News host describes a meeting between Franklin D. Roosevelt, Winston Churchill and Joseph Stalin in Tehran during World War II.
books.name: THREE DAYS AT THE BRINK

books.author: by Rachel Maddow
books.description: The MSNBC host argues that the global oil and gas industry has weakened democracies and bolstered authoritarians.
books.name: BLOWOUT

books.author: by John Lithgow
books.description: The multi-award-winning actor satirizes the Trump administration with a collection of poems and illustrations.
books.name: DUMPTY

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts and misunderstandings.
books.name: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Edward Snowden
books.description: A memoir by the former National Security Agency contractor who exposed the government’s mass surveillance program.
books.name: PERMANENT RECORD

books.author: by Carly Simon
books.description: The singer and songwriter describes her friendship with Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis.
books.name: TOUCHED BY THE SUN

books.author: by Mike Rowe
books.description: The television personality relays stories from his podcast and personal anecdotes.
books.name: THE WAY I HEARD IT

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: An owner’s manual of the human body covering various parts, functions and what happens when things go wrong.
books.name: THE BODY

books.author: by Gary Janetti
books.description: Comedic essays on everyday life by a writer and producer for television.
books.name: DO YOU MIND IF I CANCEL?

books.author: by Ali Wong
books.description: The comedian dispenses her brand of wisdom through letters to her children.
books.name: DEAR GIRLS

books.author: by Julie Andrews and Emma Walton Hamilton
books.description: The musical theater icon's second installment of her memoir describes her arrival in Hollywood, becoming a mother and her relationship with Blake Edwards.
books.name: HOME WORK

books.author: by Edmund Morris
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author chronicles the personal life, inventions and obsessions of Thomas Alva Edison.
books.name: EDISON
